Package net.evmodder.DropHeads

Class DropChanceAPI

java.lang.Object
net.evmodder.DropHeads.DropChanceAPI
public class DropChanceAPI extends Object
Public API hook for getting head drop chance data loaded from DropHeads configs Warning: This class is still in BETA and some functions may change (or disappear!) in future releases

  • Method Details

    • getDefaultDropChance

      public double getDefaultDropChance()
      Get the default head drop chance for an entity when a drop chance chance is specified in the config
      Returns:
      The default drop chance [0, 1]

    • getRawDropChance

      public double getRawDropChance(String textureKey)
      Get the raw drop chance (ignore all modifiers) of a head for a specific texture key.
      Parameters:
      textureKey - The target texture key
      Returns:
      The drop chance [0, 1]

    • getRawDropChance

      public double getRawDropChance(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
      Get the raw drop chance (ignore all modifiers) of a head for a specific entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - The target entity
      Returns:
      The drop chance [0, 1]

    • getTimeAliveBonus

      public double getTimeAliveBonus(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
      Get the drop chance multiplier applied based on how many ticks an entity has been alive
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to check the lifetime of
      Returns:
      The time-alive modifier

    • getPermsBasedDropRateModifier

      public double getPermsBasedDropRateModifier(org.bukkit.permissions.Permissible killer)
      Get the drop chance multipliers applied based on permissions of the killer
      Parameters:
      killer - The entity to check for drop chance modifier permissions
      Returns:
      The aggregate multiplier from any relevent permission nodes

    • dropHeadItem

      public void dropHeadItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack headItem, org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity, org.bukkit.entity.Entity killer, org.bukkit.event.Event evt)
      Drop a head item for an entity using the appropriate DropMode setting
      Parameters:
      headItem - The head item which will be dropped
      entity - The entity from which the head item came
      killer - The entity responsible for causing the head item to drop
      evt - The Entity*Event from which this function is being called

    • getBeheadMessage

      public net.evmodder.EvLib.extras.TellrawUtils.ListComponent getBeheadMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity, org.bukkit.entity.Entity killer, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack weapon)
      Generate a behead message component
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity that was beheaded
      killer - The entity that did the beheading
      weapon - The weapon item used to do the beheading
      Returns:
      The behead message component

    • announceHeadDrop

      public void announceHeadDrop(net.evmodder.EvLib.extras.TellrawUtils.Component message, org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity, org.bukkit.entity.Entity killer, org.bukkit.event.Event evt)
      Send a head drop announcement message for an @param entity with recipients are based on: * The AnnounceMode setting for the entity's type * The permissions of the @param killer * The pet-owner of the @param entity, if exists * Specific broadcast settings from the DropHeads config
      Parameters:
      message - The behead announcement message
      entity - The entity to announce as beheaded
      killer - The entity to announce as the killer
      evt - The Entity*Event from which this function is being called

    • logHeadDrop

      public void logHeadDrop(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity, org.bukkit.entity.Entity killer, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack weapon)
      Logs a behead event to the DropHeads log file
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity that was beheaded
      killer - The entity that did the beheading
      weapon - The weapon item used to do the beheading

    • triggerHeadDropEvent

      public boolean triggerHeadDropEvent(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity, org.bukkit.entity.Entity killer, org.bukkit.event.Event evt, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack weapon, net.evmodder.EvLib.extras.TellrawUtils.Component beheadMessage)
      Attempt to drop a head item for an Entity with a custom behead message
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity for which to to create a head
      killer - The entity which did the killing, or null
      evt - The Entity*Event from which this function is being called
      weapon - The weapon used to kill, or null
      beheadMessage - A custom behead message that will get broadcasted
      Returns:
      Whether the head drop was completed successfully

    • triggerHeadDropEvent

      public boolean triggerHeadDropEvent(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity, org.bukkit.entity.Entity killer, org.bukkit.event.Event evt, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack weapon)
      Attempt to drop a head item for an Entity with the regular behead message
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity for which to to create a head
      killer - The entity which did the killing, or null
      evt - The Entity*Event from which this function is being called
      weapon - The weapon used to kill, or null
      Returns:
      Whether the head drop was completed successfully
